nodes.text: The GXR-7 Sentinel was a battle droid model used by the Galactic Republic during the Cold War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. Two were aboard the Thranta-class corvette Brentaal Star during an attack by the Imperial Gage-class transport Black Talon and were destroyed by an Imperial boarding party.
GXR-7 Sentinels appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic as enemies during the "Black Talon" flashpoint.
